comment: 10/10 IF YOU CAN TAKE DR. DAWS PLS DO!!!

The only reason I got a C in this class was because of my own doing otherwise I probably wouldve gotten a B at the end of this class. She makes learning very fun and is so understanding to any issues you may be going through. Everything in the class is very straightforward. I would 100% take her again and recommend taking her!!
She was a amazing! I got a 97 in her class. Just do the work
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Amazing lectures--So many papers

comment: Dr. Daws was among my favorite professors at KSU. Her passion for the study of communication is infectious. The class was well-organized, but culminated in a make-or-break final project. Don't make the mistake I did - ask her for help early and often! She will help you succeed. You owe it to yourself to take a class with this incredible professor.

Dr. Daws is my favorite prof at KSU. She's so nice and wants us to learn the material. Our class was online for covid, and the way she had everything in D2L was so easy to follow and keep track of. If you do the work during the semester, the final project is a breeze. She's so accessible with a class groupme and email. TAKE HER!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: Dr. Daws is the best professor to take for any of the classes she teaches. She stepped into one of my classes where my professor quit mid-semester and she did an amazing job catching us up to speed and we still learned at a steady pace. She gives you a lot of work but she makes it easy and it's actually useful. She also responds super quick!

She is one of the best professors's I have ever had, you do have to put in the work though. The best part about her class for me was that she was willing to take a look at my paper before the due date. If you are willing to put in a little work then you should definitely get an "A". TAKE HER! NO TEST, JUST PAPERS.

If you want a good writing class I would take her every time. She is super sweet and stepped in to take over my class when I professor went on leave. Very knowledgeable and makes the writing process easier. She has tons of helpful links to APA style. I would email her before you submit something to ask if its right (a day or two in advance).

This is my second time having Professor Daws. Shes awesome. I had her for Comm 3435 this time & it was not too bad. You definitely have to do work, but it isnt like your typical research class. She makes it creative & on a top you want to do, so its a lot more interesting. Take her. Work isnt hard & if you do it by the rubric, youll get an A.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--So many papers

comment: Her tests are so difficult. She gives test over 4 chapters which is over 30 pages and chooses 33 random questions from the textbook. Her lectures dont go over anything on the tests nor does she narrow down what you need to study. She made this class much harder than it should have been.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lecture heavy--Tough grader

comment: Prof. Daws was most definitely one of the best teachers I have ever had. This woman goes above & beyond to make class relatable and fun, and she gets everyone to interact, which for a communication class, is pretty important! I learned SO much in this class & I actually looked forward to going thanks to her. She also gives super easy extra credit!
LOVE Dr. Daws. Great teacher. Provides great detail on assignments and very helpful. I thoroughly enjoyed her class and learned a lot.

Dr. Daws is the best!!! I took her online this summer semester and she does everything she can to help you! There is 3 tests and discussions every week and 5 quizzes. I passed with an A in this class without a book so its pretty easy to pass this class if you just read her lecture notes and if you watch her lecture videos! TAKE HER!!!

I have taken Dr. Daws for two classes now, she is by far the best prof i've had at KSU. She is very energetic when she teaches, and is willing to help you if you are struggling. I highly recommend her.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Dr. Daws as an amazing professor. She made class so much fun and she really knows a lot about the media. She breaks down somewhat complicated ideas into easy to understand concepts with great examples from the real world. Plus if you don't understand something she has a youtube channel where she explains it. One of the best media professors around!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: One of the few professors I've seen who are genuinely passionate about both the topics of study and her students well being. I wish I could take her for everything! Inspiring lectures and clear assignments. Fair and honest grading. She makes manadatory attendance seem easy; you'll want to be there! I strongly recommend her.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Inspirational--Amazing lectures

comment: I absolutely loved Dr. Daws. I would take her for more classes if she was teaching them but unfortunately she isn't. She is super clear about how she wants things done and she is really sweet and honestly so hilarious. The class consists of discussion posts, 2 essay tests (they're not hard, she wants you to use the book), and a final paper.

I cannot say enough good things about Dr. Daws. I wish I had taken her for more comm courses. She is super funny, open, helpful and truly passionate about her field of study. Will do whatever she can to make sure her students succeed and is available for outside help. I wouldn't call this an "easy A" but if you apply yourself it shouldn't be hard.

Her rubric does not help. her speeches want you to be a fake robot. If you are naturally monotone, you either get points off for being monotone or points off for sounding unnatural... just a tip, do all the group speech work yourself, and turn it in personally. Overall, I felt like the rubric didn't mean much as the grading left room to argue
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: You will not regret taking Dr. Daws! Her courses can be tough, but she extends a helping hand to all of her students along the way. Her material is so interesting, and she's quirky and hilarious! I look forward to class with her each week, and I actually enjoy the online assignments, readings, and video lectures. BEST PROFESSOR AT KSU. I PROMISE.

Dr. Daws is so fun and peppy but this is not an easy class. She definitely does everything she possibly can to help you out but you will have to work for an A. Tere are SO many assignments which gives you extra opportunites to get a higher grade. Make sure you go to class and do EVERY disscussion post to completion. Not hard if you put forth effort

Dr. Daws is an amazing professor. She created engaging Prezis filled with discussion opportunities, videos, interesting information, and interactive activities for every single lecture. Also, she made fill-in-the-blank notes to use for lectures. The tests are tricky, but she is always more than happy to offer up studying tips. I learned a lot!

Professor Daws is the best professor I've ever had!! You have to go to class because she takes off points if you miss, but her lectures are amazing so you'll want to go anyway. It's easy to get an A if you go to class and go over the study guide. I wish I could take her for all my classes. Seriously if you can take her do it-- you won't regret it!

Professor Daws was great! Very sweet and helpful. Loved her lectures because she tied in lots of pictures and videos and related it to the content, which made it interesting to learn. Unfortunately, she takes 5 points off of your participation grade for every class you miss. Tests are also tough, but I would still recommend taking her.

Had a B all semester. UNTIL THE GROUP SPEECH. I did my portion, gave it to the "group leader" who never turned it in. went to talk to her about it, and she told me I should have drove the 50 miles to school to babysit her assigned leader to turn it in. refused to give me any credit for the work I had done. ended with a low C. Individual class ruine

Dr. Daws is probably one of my favorite professors at KSU.  She's super laid back, but very knowledgable in her field. She shows open interest in student feedback and is always open for comment and clarification. She is invested in making each student a well-rounded citizen.  I'm going to miss taking her for COM 2030.

She is amazing! I am going to try to take her again. Her lectures are very well done and have current information and she always tries to add something that relates to her students. She is really sweet and funny and will help you if you ask. Participate in class she really likes students who do. Also come to every class participation is a grade.

Dr. Daws was an awesome public speaking professor. She knew everyone's name within the first couple of weeks, and it was really obvious that she cares about all of her students. She gives a grading rubric for each speech so you know exactly what to expect. She's always available to help out her students and never seems reluctant or bothered.

Dr. Daws is a great professor whose classes are really valuable and interesting! She grades pretty hard but if you follow the APA style format, you should be fine. Make sure to attend class. Highly recommend!
When taking this course, please have a background in TCOMM. The professor is very helpful but the class was a bit confusing. Know your APA formatting, that would help greatly.

Fun teacher with passion for APA formatting. While she is easily accessible for private help, this course does not follow the textbook. Significant supplemental reading, papers & projects required. More focus on social media & research then healthcare. Class lectures are very entertaining!

Awesome professor! Did do a lot of improv speeches and speech practices, but always made class fun and engaging. Grades attendance so COME TO CLASS! Quizzes are online so use your book. You will learn AND have fun in her class. Definitely take Dr. Daws!

She is a great professor! Her papers do take time and effort to write, but she is very easy to communicate and meet with. She offers to proofread all papers if sent to her in advance. She gives you all the tools necessary to succedd in her class. I would recommend you to take her!!

Dr. Dawes is one of the best teachers at SPSU, PERIOD! If you can take her, do it. Speeches are fun and easy, and so are the classes. Quizzes are open book and easy as well. If you want to  learn, take her, if you want to have fun, take her, if you want a good grade, take her. In short, TAKE HER!

Dr. Daws is a good teacher. She is strict and if you do not stick to the formats of her assignment you risk reviving a sub-par grade however if you can work with her format and put forward the effort, you will go far. She was fin to have as a teacher and was definitely not dry, dull or boring.

She is a FANTASTIC professor! She had group activities that she tries to make fun and interesting and they actually are! She gets the whole class involved and as long as you do the work she says and take her help full tips, you will definitely make an A in the class.

GREAT professor! She is enthusiastic and our theme was the zombie apocalypse. How cool is that? Quizzes were done online with the book. The material was covered the next day in class. Speech grading was straight forward and she went over all the guidelines before you even start. She is a newer professor at SPSU, but I would highly recommend her. <3
Good teacher
Very enthusiastic and easily heard. very involved class. reading quizes the first nine weeks. pretty easy overall

Great teacher! She will get you involved with public speaking and her class was always fun to go to!! Her speech rubrics are not that bad so you can make many mistakes and still pass each assignment. You only need the book at the very beginning because you will read and take quizzes. The book teaches you everything you need to know!!
